Ancient Power.card_desc: [Overcharge] Hitting an enemy while Overcharge is active reduces the cooldown of Blitz Upper by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Antediluvian.card_desc: [Overcharge] Increase the duration of Overcharge by {scale=0.2|0.2}s.

Carry through.card_desc: [Blitz Upper] Hitting an enemy with Blitz Upper grants you {scale=10|10}% movement speed for 3s.

Daredevil.card_desc: [Blitz Upper] Activating Blitz Upper heals you for {scale=70|70} Health.

Dark Vision.card_desc: [Blitz Upper] Killing enemies with Blitz Upper generates {scale=5|5}% ultimate charge.

Eternal.card_desc: [Rune of Travel] The duration of Rune of Travel is increased by {scale=1|1}s.

Evanescent.card_desc: [Rune of Travel] Move {scale=8|8}% faster while Rune of Travel is active.

Faustian Bargain.card_desc: [Rune of Travel] Rune of Travel no longer automatically activates, and if the Rune is not used the Cooldown is reset.

Guts.card_desc: [Armor] Take {scale=6|6}% less damage when below 40% health.

Inner Strength.card_desc: [Rune of Travel] Rune of Travel now resets the Cooldown of Overcharge and Blitz Upper when it activates.

Nothing Personal.card_desc: [True Power] Targets below 65% Health are revealed to you and your Ultimate charge rate is increased by 15%.

Primeval Might.card_desc: [Overcharge] Gain {scale=8|8}% lifesteal while Overcharge is active.

Reclamation.card_desc: [Overcharge] Reduce the Cooldown of Overcharge by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Relic Affinity.card_desc: [Blitz Upper] Hitting an enemy with Blitz Upper generates {scale=4|4} ammo.

Revitalize.card_desc: [Rune of Travel] Rune of Travel heals you for {scale=100|100} when you teleport to it.

Transient.card_desc: [Rune of Travel] Reduce the cooldown of Rune of Travel by {scale=1|1}s.

Courage.card_desc: [Rüstung] Unter 40% Gesundheit wird erlittener Schaden um {scale=6|6}% reduziert.

Draufg\u00e4nger.card_desc: [Kinnhaken] Bei Aktivierung von Kinnhaken wirst du {scale=70|70} LP geheilt.

Dunkle Vision.card_desc: [Kinnhaken] Kills mit Kinnhaken laden deine Überkraft um {scale=5|5}% auf.

Durchreise.card_desc: [Rune der Reise] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Rune der Reise um {scale=1|1}s.

Ewigkeit.card_desc: [Rune der Reise] Erhöht die Dauer von Rune der Reise um {scale=1|1}s.

Innere St\u00e4rke.card_desc: [Rune der Reise] Bei Aktivierung von Rune der Reise wird die Abklingzeit von Kinnhaken und Überladung zurückgesetzt.

Nichts Pers\u00f6nliches.card_desc: [Wahre Stärke] Ziele mit unter 65% Gesundheit werden dir offenbart. Deine Überkraft lädt 15% schneller auf.

Reklamation.card_desc: [Überladung] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Überladung um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Revitalisierung.card_desc: [Rune der Reise] Teleportierst du zur Rune der Reise, wirst du {scale=100|100} LP geheilt.

Teufelspakt.card_desc: [Rune der Reise] Rune der Reise wird nicht mehr automatisch aktiviert. Wird die Rune nicht verwendet, wird die Abklingzeit zurückgesetzt.

Uralte Macht.card_desc: [Überladung] Triffst du während Überladung einen Gegner, wird die Abklingzeit von Kinnhaken um {scale=0.5|0.5}s reduziert.

Urzeitliche Kraft.card_desc: [Überladung] Während Überladung aktiv ist, erhältst du {scale=8|8}% Lebensraub.

Verschwindend.card_desc: [Rune der Reise] Erhöht dein Lauftempo um {scale=8|8}%, während Rune der Reise aktiv ist.

Vollzug.card_desc: [Kinnhaken] Treffer mit Kinnhaken erhöhen dein Lauftempo 3s lang um {scale=10|10}%.

Vorsintflutlich.card_desc: [Überladung] Erhöht die Dauer von Überladung um {scale=0.2|0.2}s.

Cran.card_desc: [Armure] Vous subissez {scale=6|6}% de dégâts en moins quand vous avez moins de 40% de PV.

\u00c9ph\u00e9m\u00e8re.card_desc: [Rune de mobilité] Rune de mobilité se recharge {scale=1|1}s plus vite.

\u00c9ternit\u00e9.card_desc: [Rune de mobilité] Rune de mobilité dure {scale=1|1}s de plus.

\u00c9vanescence.card_desc: [Rune de mobilité] Pendant que la rune est active, votre vitesse augmente de {scale=8|8}%.

Force int\u00e9rieure.card_desc: [Rune de mobilité] À l'activation, Rune de mobilité réinitialise le temps de recharge d'Uppercut éclair et de Surcharge.

Fougue.card_desc: [Arme] Votre vitesse de rechargement augmente de {scale=8|8}%.

Jusqu'au bout.card_desc: [Uppercut éclair] Toucher un ennemi avec Uppercut éclair augmente votre vitesse de {scale=10|10}% pendant 3s.

March\u00e9 de Faust.card_desc: [Rune de mobilité] Rune de mobilité ne s'active pas à la fin de l'effet.

Pers\u00e9v\u00e9rance.card_desc: [Arme] Vous avez {scale=10|10}% de drain de vie quand vous avez moins de 40% de PV.

Pouvoir ancestral.card_desc: [Surcharge] Pendant Surcharge, toucher un ennemi réduit de {scale=0.5|0.5}s le temps de recharge d'Uppercut éclair.

Prise de risque.card_desc: [Uppercut éclair] Uppercut éclair vous rend {scale=70|70} PV.

Puissance primaire.card_desc: [Surcharge] Pendant Surcharge, vous avez {scale=8|8}% de drain de vie.

Reliquat.card_desc: [Uppercut éclair] Toucher un ennemi avec Uppercut éclair vous redonne {scale=4|4} munitions.

Revitalisation.card_desc: [Rune de mobilité] Se téléporter sur la rune vous redonne {scale=100|100} PV.

Rien de personnel.card_desc: [Puissance révélée] Les ennemis qui ont moins de 65% de PV vous sont révélés. La vitesse de chargement de Puissance révélée augmente de 15%.

Vision lugubre.card_desc: [Uppercut éclair] Chaque exécution avec Uppercut éclair donne {scale=5|5}% de charge d'ultime.

\u5185\u5728\u4e4b\u529b.card_desc: [传送符文] 使用传送符文会重置过载和闪电直击的冷却时间

\u5192\u5931\u9b3c.card_desc: [闪电直击] 使用闪电直击后回复{scale=70|70}点生命值

\u521a\u6bc5.card_desc: [武器] 生命值低于40%时获得{scale=10|10}%的生命偷取

\u56de\u6536.card_desc: [过载] 过载的冷却时间降低{scale=0.5|0.5}秒。

\u590d\u539f.card_desc: [传送符文] 传送后回复{scale=100|100}点生命

\u592a\u53e4\u4e4b\u529b.card_desc: [过载] 技能激活期间获得{scale=8|8}%的生命偷取

\u6c38\u6052.card_desc: [传送符文] 符文持续时间增加{scale=1|1}秒

\u6d6e\u58eb\u5fb7\u5951\u7ea6.card_desc: [传送符文] 传送符文不再持续时间结束后自动传送。若没有手动激活传送，则技能冷却时间重置。

\u77ac\u606f.card_desc: [传送符文] 传送符文冷却时间减少{scale=1|1}秒

\u79c1\u4eba\u6069\u6028.card_desc: [真正的力量] 大招充能速率增加{scale=12.75|.75}%，并且生命值低于65%的敌人会对你显形

\u8001\u673d.card_desc: [过载] 被过载击中的敌人3秒内治疗效果减少{scale=15|15}%

\u80c6\u91cf.card_desc: [护甲] 生命值低于40%时受到的伤害减少{scale=6|6}%

\u8f6c\u77ac\u5373\u901d.card_desc: [传送符文] 放置传送符文后，移动速度增加{scale=8|8}%

\u8fdc\u53e4\u529b\u91cf.card_desc: [过载] 过载时击中敌人减少闪电直击{scale=0.5|0.5}秒冷却时间

\u9057\u8ff9\u4e4b\u7cfb.card_desc: [闪电直击] 闪电直击每命中一个敌人会获得{scale=4|4}发弹药

\u987a\u5229\u8fc7\u5173.card_desc: [闪电直击] 闪电直击命中敌人后3秒内移动速度增加{scale=10|10}%

\u9ed1\u6697\u89c6\u754c.card_desc: [闪电直击] 闪电直击命中的敌人会显形{scale=1|1}秒

Afinidad por reliquias.card_desc: [Blitz aéreo] Recuperas {scale=4|4} de munición cuando golpeas a un enemigo con Blitz aéreo.

Antediluviano.card_desc: [Sobrecarga] Aumenta la duración de Sobrecarga en {scale=0.2|0.2}s.

Eterno.card_desc: [Runa viajera] La duración de la Runa Viajera aumenta en {scale=1|1} s.

Evanescente.card_desc: [Runa viajera] Te mueves un {scale=8|8}% más rápido mientras Runa viajera está activa.

Fuerza interna.card_desc: [Runa viajera] Runa viajera ahora restablece la recarga de Sobrecarga y Blitz aéreo al activarla.

Fuerza primeva.card_desc: [Sobrecarga] Obtienes un {scale=8|8}% de robo de vida mientras Sobrecarga está activa.

Nada Personal.card_desc: [Poder real] Objetivos con una salud por debajo del 65% son revelados y la carga de tu poder definitivo aumenta un 15%.

Persevera.card_desc: [Arma] Obtienes {scale=10|10}% de robo de vida cuando estás por debajo del 40% de salud.

Poder prehist\u00f3rico.card_desc: [Sobrecarga] Alcanzar a un enemigo mientras Sobrecarga está activa reduce la recarga de Blitz aéreo en {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

Reclamaci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Sobrecarga] Se reduce la recarga de Sobrecarga en {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Revitaliza.card_desc: [Runa viajera] Runa Viajera te cura {scale=100|100} PS cuando teletransportas hacia ella.

Sobrellevar.card_desc: [Blitz aéreo] Ganas un {scale=10|10}% de velocidad de movimiento durante 3s tras alcanzar a un enemigo con Blitz aéreo.

Temerario.card_desc: [Blitz aéreo] Te curas {scale=70|70} PS tras activar Blitz aéreo.

Transitorio.card_desc: [Runa viajera] La recarga de la Runa Viajera se reduce en {scale=1|1} s.

Trato f\u00e1ustico.card_desc: [Runa viajera] La Runa viajera ya no es activada automáticamente y si la Runa no se usa la recarga se restablece.

Tripas.card_desc: [Armadura] Recibe un {scale=6|6} % menos daño cuando estás por debajo del 40 % de salud.

\u00daltimo remanente.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta tu cantidad de munición en {scale=4|4}.

Visi\u00f3n oscura.card_desc: [Blitz aéreo] Matar enemigos con Blitz aéreo carga un {scale=5|5}% tu habilidad definitiva.

Afinidade com Rel\u00edquias.card_desc: [Pancada] Acertar um inimigo com a Pancada gera {scale=4|4} de munição.

Coragem.card_desc: [Armadura] Recebe {scale=6|6}% menos dano quando está abaixo de 40% de vida.

Dem\u00f4nio Ousado.card_desc: [Pancada] Ativar Pancada cura você em {scale=70|70} de vida.

Ef\u00eamero.card_desc: [Runa de Transporte] O intervalo da Runa de Transporte é reduzido em {scale=1|1}s.

Espirituoso.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta a velocidade de recarga da arma em {scale=8|8}%.

Eterno.card_desc: [Runa de Transporte] A duração da Runa de Transporte é aumentada em {scale=1|1}s.

Evanescente.card_desc: [Runa de Transporte] Ganha {scale=8|8}% mais velocidade de movimento enquanto a Runa de Transporte está ativa.

For\u00e7a Interior.card_desc: [Runa de Transporte] A Runa de Transporte agora zera os intervalos do Disparo Energizado e da Pancada quando é ativada.

Nada Pessoal.card_desc: [Poder Verdadeiro] Inimigos com vida abaixo de 65% são revelados a você, e sua suprema carrega 15% mais rápido.

Obstina\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Arma] Ganha {scale=10|10}% de roubo de vida quando está abaixo de 40% de vida.

Pacto de Fausto.card_desc: [Runa de Transporte] A Runa de Transporte não se ativa mais automaticamente e, se não for usada, seu intervalo é zerado.

Passando Atrav\u00e9s.card_desc: [Pancada] Acertar um inimigo com Pancada concede {scale=10|10}% mais velocidade de movimento por 3s.

Poder Antigo.card_desc: [Disparador Energizado] Acertar um inimigo enquanto o Disparador Energizado está ativo diminui o intervalo da Pancada em {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Poder Primordial.card_desc: [Disparador Energizado] Ganha {scale=8|8}% de roubo de vida enquanto o Disparador Energizado está ativo.

Pr\u00e9-diluviano.card_desc: [Disparo Energizado] A duração do Disparador Energizado aumenta em {scale=0.2|0.2}s.

Reivindica\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Disparador Energizado] Reduz o intervalo do Disparador Energizado em {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Revitaliza\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Runa de Transporte] A Runa de Transporte te cura em {scale=100|100} quando você se teleporta até ela.

\u00daltimo Remanescente.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta em {scale=4|4} a quantidade de munição.

Vis\u00e3o das Trevas.card_desc: [Pancada] Matar inimigos com a Pancada carrega {scale=5|5}% da sua suprema

\u0411\u044b\u0441\u0442\u0440\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Руна путешествий] Скорость передвижения во время действия Руны путешествий увеличивается на {scale=8|8}%.

\u0412\u0435\u0447\u043d\u043e\u0441\u04.card_desc: [Руна путешествий] Длительность Руны путешествий увеличивается на {scale=1|1} с.

\u0412\u043d\u0443\u0442\u0440\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Руна путешествий] При активации Руны путешествий Перегрузка и Стремительная атака перезаряжаются.

\u0412\u044b\u0434\u0435\u0440\u0436\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] При уровне здоровья ниже 40% вы получаете {scale=10|10}% вампиризма.

\u0414\u043e \u0441\u0430\u043c\u043e\u0.card_desc: [Стремительная атака] Попадание по врагу Стремительной атакой увеличивает вашу скорость передвижения на {scale=10|10}% на 3 с.

\u0414\u0440\u0435\u0432\u043d\u044f\u04.card_desc: [Перегрузка] Попадание по врагу Перегрузкой сокращает перезарядку Стремительной атаки на {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

\u0415\u0434\u0438\u043d\u0441\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Стремительная атака] Попадание по врагу Стремительной атакой генерирует {scale=4|4} ед. боеприпасов.

\u041c\u0443\u0436\u0435\u0441\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Броня] При уровне здоровья ниже 40% вы получаете на {scale=6|6}% меньше урона.

\u041d\u0435\u0434\u043e\u043b\u0433\u04.card_desc: [Руна путешествий] Перезарядка Руны путешествий сокращается на {scale=1|1} с.

\u041d\u0438\u0447\u0435\u0433\u043e \u0.card_desc: [Истинная сила] Вам раскрывается местоположение целей с уровнем здоровья ниже 65%, а ваш суперудар заряжается на 15% быстрее.

\u041e\u0436\u0438\u0432\u043b\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Руна путешествий] Руна путешествий исцеляет вас на {scale=100|100} ед. при телепортации к ней.

\u041f\u0435\u0440\u0432\u043e\u0437\u04.card_desc: [Перегрузка] Во время действия Перегрузки вы получаете {scale=8|8}% вампиризма.

\u0421\u043e\u0440\u0432\u0438\u0433\u04.card_desc: [Стремительная атака] Активация Стремительной атаки исцеляет вас на {scale=70|70} ед.

\u0422\u0435\u043c\u043d\u043e\u0435 \u0.card_desc: [Стремительная атака] Убийства врагов Стремительной атакой заряжают суперудар на {scale=5|5}%.

\u0424\u0430\u0443\u0441\u0442\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Руна путешествий] Руна путешествий больше не активируется автоматически. Если вы не используете ее, она полностью перезарядится.

Cyrograf Fausta.card_desc: [Runa podróży] Runa podróży nie aktywuje się automatycznie i jeśli nie zostanie użyta, czas odnowienia zostanie zresetowany.

Efemeryda.card_desc: [Runa podróży] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=8|8}%, gdy Runa podróży jest aktywna.

Kozak.card_desc: [Szybki atak] Aktywacja Szybkiego ataku przywraca {scale=70|70} PZ.

Kura\u017c.card_desc: [Pancerz] Gdy poziom zdrowia spada poniżej 40%, otrzymuje o {scale=6|6}% mniej obrażeń.

Mroczna wizja.card_desc: [Szybki atak] Zabójstwo wroga Szybkim atakiem ładuje {scale=5|5}% arcyzdolności.

Odzyskanie.card_desc: [Przeciążenie] Skraca czas odnowienia Przeciążenia o {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

O\u017cywienie.card_desc: [Runa podróży] Runa podróży przywraca ci {scale=100|100} PZ, kiedy teleportujesz się do niej.

Pierwotna moc.card_desc: [Przeciążenie] Zapewnia {scale=8|8}% kradzieży życia, gdy Przeciążenie jest aktywne.

Przebicie.card_desc: [Szybki atak] Trafienie wroga Szybkim atakiem zwiększa twoją szybkość ruchu o {scale=10|10}% na 3 s.

Przedpotopowy.card_desc: [Przeciążenie] Wydłuża czas trwania Przeciążenia o {scale=0.2|0.2} s.

Staro\u017cytna moc.card_desc: [Przeciążenie] Skraca o {scale=0.5|0.5} s czas odnowienia Wzmacniacza ciosu po trafieniu wroga, gdy Przeciążenie jest aktywne.

To nic osobistego.card_desc: [Prawdziwa moc] Cele mające poniżej 65% zdrowia zostają ujawnione, a szybkość ładowania arcyzdolności zwiększa się o 15%.

Ulotno\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Runa podróży] Skraca czas odnowienia Runy podróży o {scale=1|1} s.

Wewn\u0119trzna si\u0142a.card_desc: [Runa podróży] Runa podróży resetuje teraz czasy odnowienia Przeciążenia i Wzmacniacza ciosu.

Wieczno\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Runa podróży] Wydłuża czas aktywności Runy podróży o {scale=1|1} s.

Wsp\u00f3lnota relikwii.card_desc: [Szybki atak] Trafienie wroga Szybkim atakiem generuje {scale=4|4} szt. amunicji.

Wytrwa\u0142o\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Broń] Zapewnia {scale=10|10}% kradzieży życia przy poziomie zdrowia poniżej 40%.

Antik G\u00fc\u00e7.card_desc: [Aşırı Yükleme] Aşırı Yükleme etkinken bir düşmana vurmak Yumruklu Hücum'un Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.5|0.5} sn azaltır.

Deli Fi\u015fek.card_desc: [Yumruklu Hücum] Yumruklu Hücum'u etkinleştirmek seni {scale=70|70} Can iyileştirir.

Diriltme.card_desc: [Yolculuk Rünü] Yolculuk Rünü'ne ışınlandığında seni {scale=100|100} Can iyileştirir.

Ebedi.card_desc: [Yolculuk Rünü] Yolculuk Rünü'nün süresi {scale=1|1} sn artar.

Eski Toprak.card_desc: [Aşırı Yükleme] Aşırı Yükleme'nin süresini {scale=0.2|0.2} sn artır.

Fani.card_desc: [Yolculuk Rünü] Yolculuk Rünü'nün Bekleme Süresini {scale=1|1} sn azalt.

Gelip Ge\u00e7i\u00e7i.card_desc: [Yolculuk Rünü] Yolculuk Rünü etkinken %{scale=8|8} daha hızlı hareket et.

\u0130ade.card_desc: [Aşırı Yükleme] Aşırı Yükleme'nin Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.5|0.5} sn azalt.

\u0130lkel Kudret.card_desc: [Aşırı Yükleme] Aşırı Yükleme etkinken %{scale=8|8} Can Çalma kazan.

\u0130\u015f Tamam.card_desc: [Yumruklu Hücum] Yumruklu Hücum ile bir düşmana vurmak 3 sn boyunca %{scale=10|10} Hareket Hızı kazandırır.

Karanl\u0131k G\u00f6r\u00fc\u015f.card_desc: [Yumruklu Hücum] Yumruklu Hücum ile düşmanları katletmek Ultiyi %{scale=5|5} doldurur.

Ki\u015fisel Alg\u0131lama.card_desc: [Gerçek Güç] %65'in altında Canı olan hedefler senin için açığa çıkar ve Ulti dolum hızın %15 artar.

Metanet.card_desc: [Zırh] %40 Canın altındayken %{scale=6|6} daha az hasar al.

\u00d6z Kuvvet.card_desc: [Yolculuk Rünü] Yolculuk Rünü etkinken Aşırı Yükleme ve Yumruklu Hücum'un Bekleme Süresini sıfırlar.

\u015eeytanla Pazarl\u0131k.card_desc: [Yolculuk Rünü] Yolculuk Rünü artık otomatik olarak etkinleşmeyecek ve Rün kullanılmazsa bekleme süresi sıfırlanacak.

Yadigar Sevgisi.card_desc: [Yumruklu Hücum] Yumruklu Hücum ile bir düşmana vurmak {scale=4|4} Cephane oluşturur.
